title: 2 Bed Apartment at Lyra | Dog Friendly | Smart Home Technology
app_fee: The application fee is $50 per adult applicant.
posting_body: ['Receive one month rent free when you move into any available home between now and September 1st.', 'Select 2 bedroom homes receive an additional $500!', '*Select homes.', 'Terms and conditions apply.', 'Available for a limited time and subject to change.', 'Must move in by 09/01/22 and sign a 12 month lease or longer.', '2-Bedroom | Starting at $2,051/month | 1,102-1,215 sq.', 'ft.', 'Schedule your private tour:', '<URL>/', "Lyra at Riverdale Station delivers luminous luxury to Coon Rapids, as the area's first market-rate apartment community in over a decade.", 'Located adjacent to Riverdale Transit Station on the Northstar Commuter Rail, Lyra offers direct access to Downtown Minneapolis, and numerous options for retail, dining, and entertainment at the Riverdale Commons Shopping Center just one block from your front door.', 'Lyra includes 180 smart apartment homes, fully equipped with IOTAS Smart Home Technology including smart outlets and smart thermostats you can control anytime, anywhere.', "High-end finishes and extensive amenities including granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, outdoor pool and amenity deck, golf simulator, and private dog park provide the luxury lifestyle you've been waiting for in the thriving community you love.", 'Community Amenities', 'Grand Lobby with 2-Story Fireplace', 'Community Room with fully equipped kitchen and double-sided fireplace', 'Golf Simulator', 'Outdoor Amenity Deck with grilling stations, dining area, private seating, and fire pit', 'Outdoor Pool with lounge chairs', 'Club Room with Billiards Table', 'Mezzanine Co-Working Space', '24-Hour Fitness Center with Fitness on Demand virtual classes', 'Yoga/Private Fitness Studio', 'Private Dog Run', 'Electronic Package System', 'Complimentary Coffee Bar', 'Metro Transit Electronic Schedule Monitors', 'Underground & Surface-level Parking Available', 'Resident Storage Units Available', 'Exterior Bike Racks', 'Controlled Access Entry', 'On-site Management and 24/7 Emergency Maintenance', 'Home Amenities', '(* select homes)', 'IOTAS Smart Home Technology', 'Discounted in-home 100 Mbps high-speed Internet only $20/month', 'Smart Home Outlets & Smart Thermostat', 'USB Port', 'Open Concept Layouts', '2 finishes packages to select from', 'Granite Countertops', 'Stainless Steel Appliances', 'In-home Washer and Dryer', 'Wood-Look LVT Flooring', 'Plush Bedroom Carpet', 'Walk-in Closets*', 'Balcony or Private Terrace*', 'Direct Exterior Access*', 'Equal Housing Opportunity']
